title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 196-1.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 196-1.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This part establishes rules and regulations for Sick Leave
as set forth by Section
196-b
of the Labor

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
196-1.1

Adopted

New

York State Register December 22, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/22/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
